sourcesContent:
// OrderReviews.js import React from 'react'; function OrderReviews({ checkoutInput, paymentType, totalPrice, cartItems }) { return (

Cart Information

Total Price: ${totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
Items:
    {cartItems.map((item, index) => (
  • {item.title} - Quantity: {item.quantity}
    • ))}

Basic Information

Name: {checkoutInput.firstname} {checkoutInput.lastname}

Phone Number: {checkoutInput.phone}

Email Address: {checkoutInput.email}

City: {checkoutInput.city}

Full Address: {checkoutInput.address}

Payment Method: {paymentType}

); } export default OrderReviews;
